DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To test the hemodynamic profile generated by the MCSâ€™s ActiveCare+SFT device in ventilated patients and compare it to that of the Kendall SCD Express. Design: Comparative, prospective study. Patients are their own controls.
DOC.brief_title: ActiveCare+SFT Hemodynamic Profile Compare to SCD Express in Ventilated Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult ventilated patient (Age >18). The patient or his guardian is able and voluntarily prepared to sign the Informed Consent Form. Known, preexisting DVT or PE. Patient who is participating in another clinical trial. Patient with contraindication to use of the device including patients with leg gangrene, recent skin graft or medical situations where increase venous and lymphatic return is undesirable.
